title: GD... I love music. A lot. So in this thread we will post our favorite music.
body:
I will do one from each of my primary genres:

rock:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1NHV6NUEKNU

Metal:

"Techno": (way to big to classify, so here is some club rock-esque stuff)

EXTRAS- :D!!!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdU9v9O5Fl8&list=RDQdU9v9O5Fl8- this one is a guilty pleasure. I know all the words. and will sing along every time. no matter where I am at. same band as my reggae song too.

sorry for so many links, I just have so much I love.... here is a new one I really like too.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jV69Z8IQRFA&list=RDjV69Z8IQRFA

i'm done this time for real this time, k thanks, hope you all find something you like :) please post your favorites too! :)
